title: How to start learning quantum computing online - Quora

response.answer_text: With quantum computing, it is very easy to get ahead of yourself. In order to focus on such a topic, you must master the fundamentals of quantum computing first. Look for media or texts with the “gentle introduction” or “gentle” in them. http://physlab.org/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/Abdullah-Khalid.pdf
edX has a popular online course on Quantum Mechanics and Quantum Computation. NPTEL has an online course on Quantum Computing.
